  <title>new_lga_nigeria_2003</title>
  <abstract>A vector map describing the third level administrative units of Nigeria digitized by the International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA) in 2003.This dataset is an extract from the Administrative Map of Nigeria (Eleventh edition) drawn and printed by the Federal Surveys (2000) at a scale of 1: 1 000 000. It describes the recent Local Government Administrative Units as were created in 1996.The map contains about 774 Local Government Councils (more accurately 768 local governments in the 36 states and 6 area councils in the Federal Capital territory) in Nigeria.

This dataset can be used in various GIS applications .i.e. general administrative assessments, education, social welfare, public health, transportation, utilities, economic matters and other issues.</abstract>
